page.title: 03Landscape: The Long Leys
page.content: The Long Leys is a lane, eventually becoming a green road, leading from the centre of Cumnor village to the old ferry at Bablockhythe. It is now much overgrown and muddy in bad weather. Just off the path, hidden by trees and overgrown grass, is the Physic Well. It now looks like a small pond of cloudy water, though the walls of the well are visible. Nothing seems to be known of its history though it has the reputation of being good for eye troubles. (cp. St. Margaret's Well at Binsey not far away.)
